item.title: Help with a tut
item.dc:creator: @Sleep Sleep
item.description:
@Sleep wrote:

This REALLY makes private servers more realistic. This gives them a SMOOOOOOTH touch.

Go into Player.java and declare this:
Code:

public int FocusPointX = -1, FocusPointY = -1; public void TurnPlayerTo(int pointX, int pointY) { FocusPointX = 2*pointX+1; FocusPointY = 2*pointY+1; }


Then find
Code:

if(hitUpdateRequired) updateMask |= 0x20;

Above that add this:
Code:

if(FocusPointX != -1) updateMask |= 2;

Then find
Code:

if(hitUpdateRequired) appendHitUpdate(str);

Above that add:
Code:

if(FocusPointX != -1) appendSetFocusDestination(str);


After this:
Code:

public void clearUpdateFlags() {

Add this:
Code:

FocusPointX = FocusPointY = -1;


Save and close Player.java

Now to make it in effect

Go into Client.java and if you have magics on npcs then add this below all the magics:
Code:

TurnPlayerTo(EnemyX2, EnemyY2);

That will make it when you mage an npc you face then npc while doing so!!!!

Head on down to "Case 132" and add this in there:
Code:

TurnPlayerTo(objectX, objectY);

This will make it to where you face an object whenever you click/use it!!!!!(good for mining and woodcutting =))

Now find:
Code:

public boolean Attack() {

Add this below that:
Code:

TurnPlayerTo(EnemyX, EnemyY);

That will make it so you face the player when you are attacking/pking him!
----Cheers

Where exactly do I place everthing?

Read full topic
